items.title: Investors Bet Trump Will Make Europe Investable Again
items.description: The big hope is that Europe will move faster to implement reforms in the face of competitive threats from the U.S.

items.title: Amex sees spending growth accelerate as it projects upbeat sales this year
items.description: Amex is also boosting its dividend by 17%.

items.title: Foreigners are chasing U.S. stocks. Historically, that’s a bad sign.
items.description: Foreigners have a tendency to buy U.S. stocks right before crashes.

items.title: Verizon’s stock rises after biggest gain in five years on key subscriber metric
items.description: The company added 568,000 postpaid phone subscribers in the fourth quarter.

items.title: Base Metal Prices Rise; Copper Hits 10-Week Highs on Weaker Dollar
items.description: Base metal prices rose, with copper sitting at 10-week highs as the U.S. dollar weakened overnight on Trump’s comments.
